means: 朗费罗（姓氏； Henry Wadsworth, 1807-1882，美国著名诗人）

sentence.Network_en: What has Longfellow the most successful of them all, to offer us?
sentence.Network_cn: 他们中最成功的文人是朗费罗, 可是他又给我们提供了一些什么 呢 ?

sentence.Network_en: Longfellow was lucky in securing a professorship of modern languages at Harvard.
sentence.Network_cn: 朗费罗能够在哈佛大学当上现代语言教授是出于幸运.

sentence.Network_en: Nor was Longfellow without originality, of a limited order.
sentence.Network_cn: 朗费罗也不是缺乏独创性, 不过才华不大.
